queries.querystring: select distinct r.*, count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'
select * from dbn_report_parameters where dbn_repp_parid='pRID';

Select n.hazard, (select concat(lc1.DESCRIPTION) from mrqr_lookup_codes lc1 where lc1.type='HAZ' and lc1.code=n.hazard) HAZD, (select concat(lc1.DESCRIPTION_FR) from mrqr_lookup_codes lc1 where lc1.type='HAZ' and lc1.code=n.hazard) HAZDF, (select concat(lc1.DESCRIPTION_NL) from mrqr_lookup_codes lc1 where lc1.type='HAZ' and lc1.code=n.hazard) HAZDN, n.un_code, (select lc2.DESCRIPTION from mrqr_lookup_codes lc2 where lc2.type='UNC' and lc2.code=n.un_code) UNCD, (select lc2.DESCRIPTION_FR from mrqr_lookup_codes lc2 where lc2.type='UNC' and lc2.code=n.un_code) UNCDF, (select lc2.DESCRIPTION_NL from mrqr_lookup_codes lc2 where lc2.type='UNC' and lc2.code=n.un_code) UNCDN, n.shipping_name, n.net_expl_weight from MRQR_NSN n join MRQR_ASSETS a on a.nsn=n.nsn where a.asset='pASSET' and (n.hazard is not null or n.un_code is not null);
select a.* from MRQR_ASSETS a where a.ASSET='pASSET';
select ata.* from MRQR_ASSETS_TOP_ASSET ata where ata.ASSET='pASSET';
select AST.* from MRQR_ASSETS_STATES AST where AST.ASSET='pASSET';
select ASE.* from MRQR_ASSETS_STATES_ESSENTIAL ASE where ASE.ASSET='pASSET';

select f.FUNCTION, f.DESCRIPTION, f.PARENT, f.WSC, (select lc.description from MRQR_LOOKUP_CODES lc where lc.code=f.wsc and lc.type='WSC') WSC_DESC, f.MAN_ORG, f.FICTIVE, f.ESSENTIAL, f.SUPERVISED, concat(f.REPORT_MAINTENANCE,f.REPORT_LOGISTIC,f.REPORT_STATUS) REP_MLS, f.FUEL_NSN, f.CO2_TAX_APPLICABLE from MRQR_ASSETS a join MRQR_functions f on a.function=f.function where a.ASSET='pASSET';
select aos.STATUS, aos.STATUSDATE, aos.ORGANISM, aos.WO from MRQR_ASSETS_OPERATIONAL_STATUS aos where aos.ASSET='pASSET' LIMIT 10;
Select NAME,VALUE,QUALIFIER,UDD_COMMENT,VALIDATION_REQUIRED,VALIDATED from mrqr_dynamic_characteristics where DESCRIPTOR_VALUE='pASSET' and UDT_TABLE='ASSETS';
select AM.METER, AM.PHYSICAL, AM.LAST, AM.METERDATE, AM.FUEL, AM.CALCULATED from MRQR_ASSETS_METER AM where AM.ASSET='pASSET';

select date_format(r.READINGDATE, "%Y-%m") YMREA, r.MISSION_CODE_ID MIID, r.meter, sum(R.difference) DVAL from MRQR_READINGS r where R.ASSET='pASSET' and r.READINGDATE >= ADDDATE(curdate(), -365) Group by YMREA, MIID, r.meter;

Select N.DESCRIPTION, N.UTIL_STATUS, ncs.COMPONENT_NSN, ncs.ESSENTIAL, ncs.QTY QTYTH,ac.*, concat(substr(ncs.COMPONENT_NSN,6,2),'/',substr(ncs.COMPONENT_NSN,9,3),substr(ncs.COMPONENT_NSN,13,1),'/',substr(ncs.COMPONENT_NSN,6,2),substr(ncs.COMPONENT_NSN,9,3),substr(ncs.COMPONENT_NSN,13,1),substr(ncs.COMPONENT_NSN,14,5)) NIIN2 from mrqr_assets a join mrqr_nsn n on n.nsn=a.NSN join mrqr_nsn_components_set ncs on ncs.NSN = a.NSN left join MRQR_ASSETS_COMPONENTS ac on (ac.ASSET=a.ASSET and ncs.COMPONENT_NSN=ac.NSN) where A.ASSET='pASSET';
Select mdr.* from MRQR_MDR mdr where mdr.ASSET='pASSET' and mdr.STATUS !='C';
select aw.* from mrqr_assets_warranties aw where aw.ASSET='pASSET';

select a.ASSET,f.FUNCTION, fc.CREW,fcq.QUALIFICATION, fcq.REMARKS from mrqr_assets a JOIN MRQR_FUNCTIONS F on a.`FUNCTION` = f.`FUNCTION` JOIN mrqr_functions_crews fc on fc.FUNCTION = f.FUNCTION JOIN mrqr_functions_crews_qual fcq on fcq.CREW_ID = fc.CREW_ID where a.ASSET = 'pASSET'

select w.WO, w.ASSET, w.STATUS, w.TYPE, w.WODATE, w.PLANDATE, w.STARTDATE, w.DURATION, w.MRC, w.DEPENDENT_WO, w.MOD, wds.DESCRIPTION WDES from MRQR_WORK w left join mrqr_work_description_solution wds on w.wo=wds.wo where w.ASSET='pASSET' and w.STATUS <> 'C';

SELECT w.WO, w.ASSET, w.STATUS, w.TYPE, w.WODATE, w.PLANDATE, w.STARTDATE, w.DURATION, w.MRC, w.DEPENDENT_WO, w.MOD, wds.DESCRIPTION WDES from mrqr_assets_top_asset ATA join mrqr_work w on ata.ASSET=w.ASSET left join mrqr_work_description_solution wds on w.wo=wds.wo where ata.TOP_ASSET='pASSET' AND w.`STATUS`not in ('A','B','C')
select count(wo.WO) NBRWO, wo.HMC, date_format(wo.WODATE, "%Y-%m") YMWO from MRQR_WORK wo where wo.ASSET='pASSET' and wo.STATUS = 'C' and wo.WODATE >= ADDDATE(curdate(), -365) group by YMWO, wo.HMC;
select count(wo.WO) NBRWO, wo.ATC, date_format(wo.WODATE, "%Y-%m") YMWO from MRQR_WORK wo where wo.ASSET='pASSET' and wo.STATUS = 'C' and wo.WODATE >= ADDDATE(curdate(), -365) group by YMWO, wo.ATC;

Select year(curdate()) YEAR,aw.C1_WO_Y C1,aw.C2_WO_Y C2,aw.C3_WO_Y C3,aw.C4_WO_Y C4,aw.C5_WO_Y C5,aw.C6_WO_Y C6,aw.C7_WO_Y C7,aw.C8_WO_Y C8,aw.C9_FU_Y C9 from dbn_mr_t_assets_weekly aw where ASSET='pASSET' UNION Select year(curdate())-1 YEAR,aw.C1_WO_Y1 C1,aw.C2_WO_Y1 C2,aw.C3_WO_Y1 C3,aw.C4_WO_Y1 C4,aw.C5_WO_Y1 C5,aw.C6_WO_Y1 C6,aw.C7_WO_Y1 C7,aw.C8_WO_Y1 C8,aw.C9_FU_Y1 C9 from dbn_mr_t_assets_weekly aw where ASSET='pASSET' UNION Select year(curdate())-2 YEAR,aw.C1_WO_Y2 C1,aw.C2_WO_Y2 C2,aw.C3_WO_Y2 C3,aw.C4_WO_Y2 C4,aw.C5_WO_Y2 C5,aw.C6_WO_Y2 C6,aw.C7_WO_Y2 C7,aw.C8_WO_Y2 C8,aw.C9_FU_Y2 C9 from dbn_mr_t_assets_weekly aw where ASSET='pASSET'
select 'Yes' Template from dual

select cmre.seqno ASSSEQNO, cmre.LOC ASSLOC, cmre.LOC_DESC ASSDESC, cmre.ATA ASSIN, cmre.ATD ASSOUT, cmre.GPS_LONGITUDE ASSLONG, cmre.GPS_LATITUDE ASSLAT, 'TRROAD' LOCTYPE from MRQR_ASSETS a, MRQR_CARGO_MANIFESTS_ROAD_EFFECTIVE cmre where a.ASSET='pASSET' and a.asset=cmre.asset UNION select 999999999 ASSSEQNO, a.LATEST_STORE ASSLOC, o.description ASSDESC, 'N/A' ASSIN, 'N/A' ASSOUT, lg.GPS_LONGITUDE ASSLONG, lg.GPS_LATITUDE ASSLAT, 'LATEST STORE' LOCTYPE from MRQR_ASSETS a, MRQR_LOCATIONS_GPS lg, MRQR_ORGANISMS o where a.ASSET='pASSET' and a.LATEST_STORE=o.ORGANISM and lg.org = o.organism order by assseqno desc limit 0,2
